feed.title: Ceroflux
feed.subtitle: Almost everything is possible in games and software and it's our goal to try and reach new limits! Whether it's for entertainment or more serious purposes, we are always ready for the next challenge.

entry.title: Mephalascoven
entry.content:
A gaming (Elderscrolls Online) community website where guides and builds are shared and like minded people can find each other.

Join the webs!

Looking for an active social guild? Want to get the most out of ESO? Mephala's Coven is here for you! Inclusive atmosphere, many weekly events, helpful officers and every aspect of the game covered: PvE, PvP, crafting, builds, addons, housing and more. Say bye bye to the dungeon finder, and step into the friendliest community on discord!

Never Alone

Experience the heighest peaks and the deepest delves together with friends!

Go To Website

Details

Developer: CeroFlux

Release Date: April 8th 2019

Language: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
entry.summary: A gaming (Elderscrolls Online) community website where guides and builds are shared and like minded people can find each other.

entry.title: Jazzhands
entry.content:
An application for VR/AR on mobile phones which uses your phone’s camera to project your hands into the game world.

Description

A base application for AR and VR that makes it possible so the user can use their hands to interact with objects inside of the virtual world. No need for expensive controllers of the HTV Vive or Oculus Rift, but just your own hands.

Goals

We would like to offer an easy to use library for developers to use in their applications. Jazzhands will allow users to use their hands as controllers in VR & AR applications on their phones. Our vision is to create a market for users who do not have the money for expensive VR & AR systems, but do want to experience what it is like to use those systems. Building on cheap solutions like the Google Cardboard we offer additional functionality to use your hands in the applications you use.

Details

Developer: CeroFlux & Shellpad Interactive

Release Date: TBA

Engine: Unity

Language: C#, Java, C++
entry.summary: An application for VR/AR on mobile phones which uses your phone’s camera to project your hands into the game world.

entry.title: Timebenders
entry.content:
An online 3rd-person battle arena game where you manipulate time to overcome your opponents. Rewind time until the rewinding never happened.

Unleash Destructive Power

Experience intense 3rd person magical combat. Battle your opponents on fully destructible terrain with great energy and powerful spells.

Bend the Flow of Time

Time is of the essence. Send yourself to the future or freeze your opponents. Rewind yourself, the world or your opponent. You control the time.

Develop your Magic

Select your class and build your deck from a wide range of spells, with hundreds of possible different combinations. Make your own selection of Time, Energy and Movement spells and devise your own unique style of combat.

Go To Website

Details

Developer: Oogbaard

Release Date: TBA

Engine: Unity

Language: C#
entry.summary: An online 3rd-person battle arena game where you manipulate time to overcome your opponents. Rewind time until the rewinding never happened.

entry.title: Fingeringmoma
entry.content:
A funny mobile game where you use your finger to flick balls across the screen.

Casual play

Flick balls across the house with this interactive finger simulator! With the intense power of just a single finger try to get a score as high as possible or do tricks to impress all your friends!

Details

Developer: CeroFlux & Shellpad Interactive

Release Date: TBA

Engine: Unity

Language: C#
entry.summary: A funny mobile game where you use your finger to flick balls across the screen.
